************
ZODB Recipes
************

Recipes for working with ZODB.

Changes
*******

0.2.1 (2007-04-23)
================

Bugs Fixed
----------

- crontab and logrotate configuration files were being generates incorrectly.

0.2 (2007-04-17)
================

Added handling of %import directives.

0.1 (2007-04-13)
================

Initial release.
